import React from "react"; import "./Dashboard.css"; import socketIOClient from 'socket.io-client'; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const ENDPOINT = "http://localhost:4000"; function ApiData() { const [response, setResponse] = useState(""); const [msg, setmsg] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const socket = socketIOClient(ENDPOINT); socket.on("FromAPI", data => { console.log('Data from api') setResponse(data); }); }, []); return (
